1.name: BSF-07 Hornet
1.description: BSF-07 Also known as 'Hornet' - first starfigter prototype to be successful, unfortunately due to technology limitation at the time fighter was made in, it only carries missiles and has no shields.

2.name: BSF-10 Spacefire
2.description: BSF-10 Also known as 'Spacefire' is the improved version of the BSF-07 fighter, it's engine performance was improved by 20% and it has also received new weapon systems.

3.name: BSF-25 Starhawk
3.description: BSF-25 Also known as 'Starhawk' is the final version of the BSF starfighters series, being equipped with new weapon systems and miniturized shields, this starfighter is a force to be reckoned with.

4.name: CI-10 Hornet
4.description: CI-10 , or as admirals like to call it 'Peacemaker', is a direct counter to the starfighter threat. With it's rapid-charged lasers it is able to shoot at multiple starfighters at once, unfortunately it's weapons firepower is limited.

5.name: CI-25 Hornet
5.description: CI-25 having nickname 'Centurion', is the upgunned version of CI-10. Since starfighter fleets started having massive losses due to the new appearence of the CI-10, it was decided by engineers from planet Katuhl-1301 that there has to be a cruiser to stop the already mentioned CI-10's.

6.name: Na-Thalis Destroyer
6.description: The ultimate spaceship originally intended to counter every other type of spaceship ever made by being able to carry both rapid firing lasers and massive lasers at the same time. Due to the unexpected massive energy requirements encountered during its development, it became unable to carry rapid firing lasers, making it specialized for destroying cruisers.
